name: Adobe Photoshop Cloud Document
summary: A PSDC file is an Adobe Photoshop document saved in the Adobe Photoshop Document Cloud (PSDC) format. It contains an image in the same format as a .PSD file, including layers, annotations, and effects, but is stored in the cloud via Adobe's cloud documents system. Photoshop automatically updates the PSDC file when a user opens and modifies it on different devices.
